Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Reroute at 83rd/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 83rd, Western, 79th and Kedzie due to, street blockage near 83rd/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 83rd, Western, 79th and Kedzie due to, street blockage near 83rd/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 95th/Dan Ryan and Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and 95th/Dan Ryan due to a police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and 95th/Dan Ryan due to a police investigation.

Shuttle buses are available between Roosevelt and 95th/Dan Ryan to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
